short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All-in-one tool for quick access to LiU resources (2024).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This LiU Browser Extension offers quick access to essential LiU resources, including room bookings, printers, campus maps, exam dates, statistics, and custom bookmarks—all in one place. No login required.

  *  Access Key Resources: Quickly reach commonly used tools like room bookings, printers, and software, with reorderable shortcuts.

  *  Navigate Campuses: Easily find maps to any LiU campus.

  *  Manage Exam Dates: Search for upcoming exams and add them directly to your Google Calendar.

  *  View Exam Stats: Display course exam statistics in clear, easy-to-read pie charts.

  *  Create Custom Bookmarks: Organize bookmarks for courses and assignments separately from personal ones.

 *  Explore Additional Info: Access less frequent resources like maintenance stats and term start dates.

The extension doesn’t collect personal data and can be reset to default at any time. Currently available in English, with Swedish support coming soon. Note: This extension is not officially affiliated with LiU.


Updates:
   
   Version (1.1.0):
  - Updated the link to Lisam (previously set to Outlook).
  - Minor adjustments for a smoother user experience.
